data.text:
On @MorningsMaria this morning:

“The SAVE Act makes complete sense to most Americans. I'm one of the co-sponsors of the bill in the United States Senate. We're going to keep pressing on this.” https://t.co/fFups1ZGjy

As a supporter of strong U.S.-ROK economic relations, I expect our trading partners always to treat American companies in a fair and non-discriminatory manner. @Jim_Jordan and @JudiciaryGOP are asking important and timely questions. https://t.co/YOQxraCH8B
Great to join @ShannonBream on @FoxNewsSunday this morning. https://t.co/ZwOyxrfCWz

Verizon broke my trust. They illegally shared my data, and CEO Dan Schulman ignored my letter I sent to him. 

@Verizon, can you hear me now? https://t.co/LQU7beyd0o

Verizon broke my trust. They shared my data, and CEO Dan Schulman ignored my letter I sent to him. 

@Verizon, can you hear me now? https://t.co/LQU7beyKPW

.@Verizon’s complicity in Jack Smith’s witch hunt against President Trump and his supporters, like me, constitutes a profound breach of trust. If this can happen to a sitting United States Senator, it can happen to any American. We need accountability.

Yesterday, I took the
Thank you @POTUS for your leadership and assistance as Tennesseans continue to recover from the devastating winter storm. https://t.co/fJxbkX6dK0
